name: Logical operators should be enclosed in proper parenthesis in Subroutines (FORTRAN)
description: All the artifacts are reported that have insufficient parenthesis for these types of logical operators. The Cast analysis will look at this on a line per line basis; multi-line checking is not taken into account. The last case is actually considered a violation from a readibility perspective.
rationale: For readability purposes, all the logical operators in a conditional statement (AND, OR, XOR and NOT) should be enclosed in parenthesis.
remediation: Add proper parenthesis to each and every condition and make sure that a condition does not spread over multiple lines.
alternativeName: Logical operators should be enclosed in proper parenthesis in Subroutines (FORTRAN)
